name: Knives Hit
description:
Use the knives hit the blocks and destroy them as much as possible.

Get ready for amazing new knives hit challenge.
Collect the gems by hitting knives and buy new skins for your knives hit.
Try not to loose the count of knives hit, otherwise you will not be able to play further.
Also, focus on your lives, if they are falling low, then let knives hit the heart power-up.
Enjoy this amazing casual game challenge.
